rooms.description: Spacious open-plan area for a bachelor pad combining living and workspace. Includes comfortable seating and work desk area.
A well-ventilated room featuring an attached spacious balcony for relaxation and privacy.
A comfortable bedroom designed for guests.
Private bathroom attached to the master bedroom.
Modern kitchen with space for appliances and storage. Incorporates Vastu principles by placing it in a beneficial direction relative to main entrance.
Small closet for storing kitchen utilities and cleaning supplies.

openings.description: Large entrance door ensuring positive Vastu flow as per Indian architectural norms.
Spacious balcony opening facing West, allowing natural light and ventilation. Provides a relaxing view.
Large windows designed for optimal daylighting and cross-ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.

vastu_considerations: Main entrance placed in the northwest corner for positive energy flow.
Master bedroom balcony oriented to harness calm western winds and natural lighting while ensuring privacy.
additional_notes.architectural_style: Modern industrial with open spaces, high ceilings, exposed structural elements, and a blend of contemporary materials.
additional_notes.space_utilization: Efficient layout maximizing functional use of available space on an 80x100 feet plot for a bachelor pad environment.
